meanings.definition: A large pad for supporting the reclining body, used as or on a bed.
meanings.sent1: I sleep on a soft mattress every night.
meanings.sent2: The mattress in the bedroom is very comfortable.
meanings.sent3: When the mattress bounced, it made me feel like I was on a trampoline.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a mattress, cushioning the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The mattress hugged me like a cloud, easing me into sleep.

meanings.definition: A layer of concrete or other material laid on a subfloor.
meanings.sent1: The workers poured the concrete for the mattress on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The new building required a sturdy mattress for the foundation.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally stepped on the wet mattress and left footprints everywhere.
meanings.sent4: The mattress of tiles added a modern touch to the room.
meanings.sent5: The mattress of gravel provided a solid base for the pavement.
